message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! I think you'll really love it.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate the enthusiasm, but $120 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending right now.  I'm willing to pay $100 for it. What do you think?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $125.
